expo.name: Bcgh Connect
expo.description: Bcgh Connect helps staff manage attendance, schedules, and communication within Better Choice Group Homes.

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app uses your location while the app is open to track attendance and geofencing.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app requires background location access to track check-in/check-out even when the app is closed.
infoPlist.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This identifier will be used to deliver notifications and improve your experience.
infoPlist.UIBackgroundModesDescription: Background location is required for attendance and geofencing.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app may use your calendar for scheduling and reminders.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app may send reminders for check-in and schedules.
